Production: Suede Film, Filmédis, Personafilm, Incorporated Television Company
Plot: After having neglected her children for many years, world famous pianist Charlotte visits her daughter Eva in her home. To her surprise she finds her other daughter, Helena, there as well. Helena is mentally disabled, and Eva has taken Helena out of the institution where their mother had placed her. The tension between Charlotte and Eva only builds up slowly, until a nightly conversation releases all the things they have wanted to tell each other.
Title: Autumn Sonata
Actors: Ingrid Bergman, Liv Ullmann, Lena Nyman, Halvar Björk
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 10 wins & 7 nominations.
Country: Sweden, France, West Germany, UK, Norway
